author: etan_status
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3151
anyone objected to merging this as capella light client format? adds `ExecutionPayloadHeader` fields into the `LightClientHeader` struct

Nimbus implementation https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/4514 (~600 loc)

As usual with light client data serving, it is not required to have this implemented by launch. What would be nice is, that if you have altair implemented but not the capella format, to consider stopping gossip on the capella LC topics (to prevent conflicting data format from descoring each other)
